I can wear a medium, but I typically wear a large so I have a bit of room (and I’ll go for an XL or a 2XL if I want it oversized). I saw everyone in the reviews saying the sizing was off so to go up a size or 2, which is exactly what I did (and I ordered an XL). And it doesn’t fit like an XL. The chest an abdomen part of the hoodie feels like it’s somewhere between a medium and a large. While trying to put it on, it felt a bit snug like a medium would (without being too tight or uncomfortable) and when it was on it felt like I had a bit more space like a large. What’s weird is that the sleeves are sized correctly, fitting like an XL or maybe even a 2XL. It’s made out a thicker material than I was expecting and will probably do a decent job at keeping you warm, which is great since right now it’s cold where I live.

As the title states, I am the fashionista for my grandson. Yes that’s right you read it correctly. He is 15 years old stand about 5‘7“ tall. I love the way it feels The way it actually fits is amazing I just wish they had pants to match

Once again, this is for decorative purposes only. With in a week of light occasional wear, the threading around the pockets started to separate and unravel. I did however, manage to use a couple of carefully placed beads of fabric super glue per say, to temporarily mend it back to it's original position but why, I ask why, am I having to do this on a brand new cool looking hoodie? Very disappointed because now I'm wondering how the heck I'm gonna wash it without it completely falling apart...if you can't trust the workmanship...how do you trust the wash instructions on the tag? You get what you pay for ladies and gents! Proceed with caution.

评论概述: Yellow pullover is safety yellow, not mustard as in the pictures.
评论详情: Honestly, the sweater is nice. I don't mind how thin it is, considering my climate, and overall it fits nicely.  Besides it being WAY brighter yellow than expected, the material feels like better than dollar store fabric.  Despite those complaints, the sweater is nice enough for the price.

The hoody is awesome. But a heads-up: unlike a lot of sizes on Amazon, this actually IS the size described. I went up two sizes, thinking it would run small and I wanted it a bit baggy. Well, it swallows me. I love this hoody.

Overall, I think it’s nice, I do wish it was a bit bigger for the size listed, i got an XL but it felt a bit more constricted towards the abdomen area. My only real issue is that the stitching on the big pocket seem to be unfinished and never tied off so on the top left and bottom right sides it’s come loose and you can see the thread having come off the material altogether, so, if I try to put my hands in the pockets, I can feel the pocket actually coming off. The material is nice and I like the color it just seems they rushed towards the end on manufacturing. If it weren’t for the stitching, I would have probably given a five star.
I love love loved this one. size is right on point.

评论概述: Good fit, BUT Wording is upside-down.
评论详情: Im 6'2" 180lbs, I ordered the XXL for the baggy look. The fit is what I expected, and seems normal.  HOWEVER, the wording on the product "Forever Young" is upside down.  1 stars until I get a replacement with proper facing wording.  Edit #1: I got the replacement and the wording "Forever Young" is STILL upside-down. Edit #2: this review will stay 1 star. Amazon will not replace an item that's already been replaced even if it's defective. I had to take this to an alterationist to get the hem/wording flipped right-side-up.
